title: Burst spells

properties.name: description
properties.value: Burst spells are the weaker group of multi-target damaging Magic spells in the Ancient spellbook, and the second weakest group overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Burst spells

Burst spells are the weaker group of multi-target damaging Magic spells in the Ancient spellbook, and the second weakest group overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area.

Icon Mobile
icon 		Spell Level Runes Base XP Max damage
(without bonuses)
Smoke Burst 62 2 2 4 2 36 17
Shadow Burst 64 1 4 2 2 37 18
Blood Burst 68 2 4 2 39 21
Ice Burst 70 4 4 2 40 22

rawContent:
{{External|rs}} '''Burst spells''' are the weaker group of multi-target damaging [[Magic]] spells in the [[Ancient Magick|Ancient spellbook]], and the second weakest group overall. These spells hit up to nine targets in a 3x3 square area. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !Icon ![[Mobile]]
icon !Spell !Level !Runes !Base XP !Max damage
(without bonuses) |- |[[File:Smoke Burst.png]] |[[File:Smoke Burst icon (mobile).png]] |[[Smoke Burst]] |{{SCP|Magic|62}} |{{RuneReq|Air=2|Fire=2|Chaos=4|Death=2}} |36 |17 |- |[[File:Shadow Burst.png]] |[[File:Shadow Burst icon (mobile).png]] |[[Shadow Burst]] |{{SCP|Magic|64}} |{{RuneReq|Soul=2|Chaos=4|Air=1|Death=2}} |37 |18 |- |[[File:Blood Burst.png]] |[[File:Blood Burst icon (mobile).png]] |[[Blood Burst]] |{{SCP|Magic|68}} |{{RuneReq|Death=2|Blood=2|Chaos=4}} |39 |21 |- |[[File:Ice Burst.png]] |[[File:Ice Burst icon (mobile).png]] |[[Ice Burst]] |{{SCP|Magic|70}} |{{RuneReq|Death=2|Chaos=4|Water=4}} |40 |22 |} ==Gallery== Smoke Burst.gif|Smoke Burst Shadow Burst.gif|Shadow Burst Blood Burst.gif|Blood Burst Ice Burst.gif|Ice Burst {{Combat spells}} {{Ancient Magicks}}
